    #include<iostream>
    #include<cmath>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    int main() {
    	int t;
    	cin >> t;
    	while(t--) {
    		int n,m,s,p,q,count=0;
    		cin >> n >> m >> s >> p >> q;
    		int A=1,B=1,len = (n-m+1);
    		while(s--) {
    			A += p;
    			B += q;
    			if((A>=m) && (B>=m) && (((A-B)%len) == 0))
    				count++;
    		}
    		cout << count << "\n";
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
